document_data.mainbody:
Wariton Minlow was a nobleman from Hlondeth, an independent city-state in the Vilhon Reach, active circa 1020 DR.
For a short period of time in the early 11 century DR, Wariton Minlow was the leader of an influential noble family of Hlondeth and a contender for the citys seat of power. The familys claim to power was cut short in the , following Wariton Minlows death. The nobleman did not leave a heir, and Hlondeths throne was claimed by House Extaminos.
